title: lagosnoir
author: lagosnoir
content: Description: SELF UNBOSOM (2018) 32 inches width by 42 inches height. Pyrography art (drawing with burn marks) by Hanson Okere. Conceptual  of an African male youth literally unzipping himself. Hanson Okere is a rising star in the contemporary art scene.Weight: About 10kg.Front Image: https://www.imagebam.com/view/MEN6EWBAccepted payment method: Bitcoin Escrow Only.Starting bid:0.050 BTC with bid increments of 0.005 BTC.Buy it now: 0.0695 BTCEnd date and time: The end of September 30, 2023. 11.59 PM Midnight ( GMT)See countdown Link: https://www.tickcounter.com/countdown/4366946/arttrade-auction-sept Shipping: Bid price includes worldwide courier to your country. Buyer responsible for own country taxes.Delivery will be by international shipping with tracking. DHL or similar company.After the auction ends, I will contact you for delivery information as well as name escrow chosen on bitcointalk.Do not hesitate to ask questions.arttrading.org
